'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is an [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire abilities|ability]] in {{poe2}}.

==Description==
{{Description|{{#var:description}}}}

==Effects==
{{#var:effects_formatted}}

==Notes==
* Raw Damage is dealt to the caster.
* The [[Concelhaut]] phantom will auto-attack with a weapon, and can be tasked to cast each of the following spells once per summon, time permitting: [[Concelhaut's Crushing Doom]], [[Concelhaut's Parasitic Staff]], [[Concelhaut's Draining Missiles]], [[Concelhaut's Draining Touch]], [[Concelhaut's Corrosive Siphon]], [[Concelhaut's Corrosive Skin]].  Spells that are above the Watcher's level will not be available.
title: Visage of Concelhaut (Deadfire)
